name: SkyThrills!
about: SkyThrills is a unique flying experience provider specializing in custom aerobatic flights, scenic flights, and charter flights. Located in Santa Ana, California, we offer introductory flight lessons and thrilling aerobatic experiences in exotic aircraft, including the Citabria trainer. Our expert instructor, Michael Blackstone, ensures a safe and educational experience, providing detailed safety instructions and hands-on training. Guests can enjoy high-performance stunt planes and perform aerobatics on their first flight. Our facility is equipped with themed safety briefing rooms and comfortable amenities for guests. We prioritize safety, education, and the thrill of flying, making every experience memorable and exhilarating. Whether you're a novice or an aviation enthusiast, SkyThrills promises an unforgettable adventure in the skies.
